results.deck: A third person hack and slash game set in feudal Japan featuring vegetable ninja and samurai.
results.name: Yasai Ninja

results.deck: Indivisible is an action RPG from Lab Zero Games, the makers of Skullgirls.
results.name: Indivisible

results.deck: A spiritual successor to the Mega Man Legends franchise by Comcept.
results.name: Red Ash

results.deck: The 2015 edition of 2K and Yuke's WWE 2K franchise.
results.name: WWE 2K16

results.deck: A side-scrolling platformer based on the 2015 animated film.
results.name: The Peanuts Movie: Snoopy's Grand Adventure

results.deck: Hob is an action-adventure that takes place in a world that is beautiful and full of life on its surface, yet filled with failing machinery beneath the surface. The player is encouraged to learn and discover through exploring the world as the game offers no narration or dialogue.
results.name: Hob

results.deck: Bard's Gold is a 2D arcade platformer with light RPG elements.
results.name: Bard's Gold

results.deck: An isometric tactical-RPG developed by King Art Games.
results.name: The Dwarves

results.deck: A cart racer that pits death against the elderly.
results.name: Coffin Dodgers

results.deck: A game from Deck 13 and Focus Home Interactive (Lords of the Fallen). The Surge is an action RPG set in a dystopian sic-fi future.
results.name: The Surge

results.deck: The World Rally Championship license moves to new developer Kylotonn Games for the 2015 season.
results.name: WRC 5

results.deck: BigBen and HB Studios adds the official Rugby World Cup license to their 2015 Rugby game.
results.name: Rugby World Cup 2015

results.deck: The third game in the open world crime series. Mafia III follows Vietnam veteran, mixed-race Lincoln Clay in 1960s New Orleans, when the racism is bluming, as he aspires for revenge against those who have harmed his family.
results.name: Mafia III

results.deck: Pang Adventures is a 2016 entry in the Buster Bros./Pang series, by PastaGames and DotEmu.
results.name: Pang Adventures

results.deck: The sequel to Halo Wars developed by Creative Assembly for the Xbox One and Windows 10.
results.name: Halo Wars 2

results.deck: A point & click adventure game by Ron Gilbert and Gary Winnick.
results.name: Thimbleweed Park

results.deck: Originally released as a PlayStation exclusive Koei-Tecmo/Omega Force Attack on Titan game (PS3, PS4 and Vita), this game will also release on Steam and Xbox One outside of Japan. It features a focus on quick action and item management like other games based on the franchise while exploring the story of the 2013 anime.
results.name: Attack on Titan

results.deck: An assassination-focused stealth-action game set in the World War II & Cold War eras, about a KGB agent secretly working with the CIA. Similarly to the Hitman games, it features open levels with many different ways of taking out a target.
results.name: Alekhine's Gun

results.deck: The sequel to Ludosity's top-down action-adventure game.
results.name: Ittle Dew 2

results.deck: Read Only Memories is a cyberpunk adventure game focused on the dark side of technology in the year 2064.
results.name: Read Only Memories

results.deck: Ultimate Chicken Horse is a party platformer for up to four people where the players place platforms, traps and hazards and try to make the level too difficult for their friends, but easy enough for them.
results.name: Ultimate Chicken Horse

results.deck: When the hotel double books rooms, the only answer is to have an all-out battle with the other potential guests to secure a reservation.
results.name: Check In, Knock Out

results.deck: It's 3 AM and your neighbors are partying hard, stop the party by any means necessary.
results.name: Party Hard

results.deck: Match 3 puzzler in a toy factory.
results.name: Tina's Toy Factory

results.deck: Fish as a Redneck with dynamite.
results.name: Dynamite Fishing: World Games

results.deck: A psychological horror game from Bloober Team SA.
results.name: Layers of Fear

results.deck: A compilation containing the remastered versions of the Resident Evil remake and Resident Evil Zero.
results.name: Resident Evil Origins Collection

results.deck: Headlander is a 2D side-scrolling game set in a 1970's sci-fi inspired utopia, in which the main character's head flies around independently, taking control of different bodies in the world.  It is being developed by DoubleFine and Adult Swim Games, set for release in 2016.
results.name: Headlander

results.deck: Boss 101 is a shoot-em-up with a large focus on bosses. Players can fight randomly generated bosses or even build their own.
results.name: Boss 101 with S.T.E.V.E. and Max

results.deck: A sidescrolling stunt game, based on Pumped BMX 2 for mobile platforms, Pumped BMX+ is retooled for consoles.
results.name: Pumped BMX+

results.deck: A One Piece fighting game developed by Spike Chunsoft for PlayStation 4, PlayStation Vita, and Xbox One.
results.name: One Piece: Burning Blood

results.deck: An open-ended country-life RPG in which players can manage their own farm and interact with the surrounding community.
results.name: Stardew Valley

results.deck: Mimic Arena is a multiplayer platformer where each players' actions are recorded and replayed as teammates for each player.
results.name: Mimic Arena

results.deck: Masquerada: Songs and Shadows is an isometric, "pause-for-tactics" role-playing game from Witching Hour Studios.
results.name: Masquerada: Songs and Shadows

results.deck: Control lasers to the beat in this dual analog stick rhythm game.
results.name: Laserlife

results.deck: 2D platformer that takes place in a circus arena.
results.name: Penarium

results.deck: The Let's Sing franchise hops to the PlayStation 4,Xbox one and PC as well as continuing on the Wii.
results.name: Let's Sing 2016

results.deck: The MLB takes another swing in the 2016 edition of R.B.I. Baseball.
results.name: R.B.I. Baseball 16

results.deck: A heist themed action puzzle game set in New York.
results.name: Fat City

results.deck: The next Far Cry game will focus on prehistoric themes.
results.name: Far Cry: Primal

results.deck: Jackbox Games returns with five more comedic party games.
results.name: The Jackbox Party Pack 2

results.deck: Thrilling story-oriented sci-fi adventure on Mars. Puzzles, mysteries, hidden clues and objects... follow the three young astronauts trying to survive in the abandoned dome city.
results.name: Dome City

results.deck: A first person adventure game based on the Goosebumps series of horror themed children's books.
results.name: Goosebumps: The Game

results.deck: A second prequel to the NBC television series "Heroes Reborn"
results.name: Gemini: Heroes Reborn

results.deck: The Park is a first person psychological horror game from the developers of The Secret World.
results.name: The Park

results.deck: Toto Temple Deluxe is a fast-paced, local-multiplayer party game in which players must steal an egg-laying goat from their friends and try to keep it on their own head for as long as possible.
results.name: Toto Temple Deluxe

results.deck: A snowboarding horse game thats a combination of SSX and Tony Hawk.
results.name: Snow Horse

results.deck: A combination fighting game/RPG for multi-platform release.
results.name: DarkEdeNight

results.deck: An arcade offroad racing game by EnjoyUp Games
results.name: Rock 'N Racing Off Road DX

results.deck: The second Disney-branded Just Dance focuses on the company's teen-oriented live action TV shows and films exclusively.
results.name: Just Dance Disney Party 2

results.deck: A game of fishing.
results.name: Dovetail Games Euro Fishing

results.deck: EA Sports' Mixed Martial Arts sequel furthers their effort to make the definitive UFC simulation game.
results.name: EA Sports UFC 2

results.deck: The second episodic adventure game developed by Telltale Games set within the 'Song of Ice and Fire' universe.
results.name: Telltale's Game of Thrones: Season 2

results.deck: A Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles game from PlatinumGames and Activision, based on IDW's comic book version of the mutants.
results.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants in Manhattan

results.deck: Run through the grid in this runner set in the Tron universe.
results.name: TRON RUN/r

results.deck: Telltale Games brings their trademark adventure game style to the Caped Crusader.
results.name: Batman: A Telltale Games Series

results.deck: FarSight Studios has produced a PS4 and Xbox One bowling game with the Brunswick license.
results.name: Brunswick Pro Bowling

results.deck: In addition to the obligatory balance tweaks, this upgrade to Tekken 7 adds additional characters - including Akuma from the Street Fighter series.
results.name: Tekken 7: Fated Retribution

results.deck: Little Devil Inside is a crowdfunded 3D action adventure RPG game.
results.name: Little Devil Inside

results.deck: An indie horror game about a pizza man getting trapped in a house by a girl named Emily, and her possessed dolls.
results.name: Emily Wants to Play

results.deck: The third game in the Sydney Hunter series.
results.name: Sydney Hunter and the Curse of the Mayans

results.deck: Shooting Love Trilogy is an Action game, developed and published by Triangle Service the people that brought you Shooting Love, 200X for Xbox 360.
results.name: Shooting Love Trilogy

results.deck: Upcoming JRPG from Japan Dev Experience Inc. set for a 2017 Worldwide Release.
results.name: Students of Round 2

results.deck: A rhythm and fitness title being Developed by Virtual Air Guitar. A Xbox One exclusive that use's the kinect.
results.name: Beatsplosion for Kinect

results.deck: Frizzy is a platformer developed and published by Team Frizz for PC and Xbox One
results.name: Frizzy

results.deck: An adventure game about a group of friends that accidentally open a paranormal rift on an old military island.
results.name: Oxenfree

results.deck: Deliver Us the Moon is a survival/exploration game where a rogue astronaut is sent to the moon on a secret mission to save humanity.  The astronaut has only one companion to aid him on this quest, his robot ASE, the All Seeing Eye. Together they will explore abandoned bases and traverse the lunar landscape gathering research to properly assess what steps mankind should take to save themselves from a rapidly declining earth.
results.name: Deliver Us the Moon

results.deck: The long awaited successor to Tennis in the Face.
results.name: Baseball Riot

results.deck: Glory is a first-person shooter with role-playing game hooks from Reach Game Studios.
results.name: Glory

results.deck: Wondershot aims to bring back the fun and good times you had playing couch competitive and co-op with your family and friends.
results.name: Wondershot

results.deck:
101 Ways To Die is a physics-based puzzler with a twist.

It's not about Killing...
It's about Killing with style!
results.name: 101 Ways to Die

results.deck: Wells is a action side-scrolling game with 3D graphics, its style is a direct reference to a classic subgenre of games that was popular in the 90's, the Run and Gun. Prepare yourself for facing hordes of enemeies, explosions, gigantic bosses and a dangerous and fascinating jorney into a steampunk universe.
results.name: Wells

results.deck: Some of the creators of Burnout are working on a new golf game.
results.name: Dangerous Golf

results.deck: Inspired by Irish folklore, Song of the Deep is a 2D, side-scrolling, underwater adventure game from Insomniac Games.
results.name: Song of the Deep

results.deck: Livelock is a cooperative top-down shooter from Tuque Games.
results.name: Livelock

results.deck: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens covers the seventh film and includes material that occurred between Return of the Jedi and Force Awakens.
results.name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens

results.deck: The third in Tru Blu's series of rugby games.
results.name: Rugby Challenge 3

results.deck: A same-screen vehicular combat party game that supports up to 16 local players, inspired by Mashed and Micro Machines.
results.name: Obliteracers

results.deck: Trial by Viking is a single-player side-scrolling action adventure game from Last Life Games.
results.name: Trial by Viking

results.deck: A mystery game that adapts the classic Hercule Poirot detective novel.
results.name: Agatha Christie: The ABC Murders

results.deck: 2016's entry in the Call of Duty franchise will be developed by Infinity Ward.
results.name: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare

results.deck: Smash down trails, launch huge jumps, pull off insane tricks, win tons of gear, build amazing trails and challenge friends to be the King of the Mountain.
results.name: Bike Mayhem 2

results.deck: H1Z1: King of the Kill is a fast-paced shooter that uses Playerunknown's Battle Royale system in which players compete against eachother in a 100+ players battle. The objective is to be the last standing man.
results.name: H1Z1: King of the Kill

results.deck: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 3 is a first person shooter that mainly focuses on sniping like its predecessors. It is more open world this time around with different ways of going about missions.
results.name: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 3

results.deck: A puzzle-platformer in which players switch between characters to record movements, rewind and then combine them to advance.
results.name: Replay: VHS is Not Dead

results.deck: Insurgency: Sandstorm developed by New World Interactive, is the predecessor to the successful source engine mod Insurgency. Despite its mod based past, Insurgency: Sandstorm is a standalone product.
results.name: Insurgency: Sandstorm

results.deck: A narrative-driven, top-down infiltration game set in South America about investigating a cult.
results.name: The Church in the Darkness

results.deck: Join the Italian resistance and snipe the hell out of fascists in the latest Sniper Elite game.
results.name: Sniper Elite 4

results.deck: A first person puzzle game made in Unreal Engine 4 coming to PC and Xbox One.
results.name: The Turing Test

results.deck: Pankapu: The Dreamkeeper
results.name: Pankapu: The Dreamkeeper

results.deck: BigBen's not-Tetris puzzle game now continues being not Tetris on another generation of consoles.
results.name: Tetraminos

results.deck: Gear Gauntlet is a 2D action arcade game from Drop Dead Interactive.
results.name: Gear Gauntlet

results.deck: Skylar & Plux: Adventure on Clover Island is a 3D platformer that draws inspiration from the 64-bit era of platforming games.
results.name: Skylar & Plux: Adventure on Clover Island

results.deck: Imperia Online is a browser-based multiplayer online strategy game developed by the Bulgarian software company Imperia Online Ltd.
results.name: Imperia Online

results.deck: An indie soccer game for Xbox One.
results.name: Active Soccer 2 DX

results.deck: Death Squared is a cooperative puzzle game from SMG Studio.
results.name: Death Squared

results.deck: NeuroVoider is a futuristic twin-stick shooter RPG currently on Steam Early Access. It was developed by Flying Oak Games.
results.name: NeuroVoider

results.deck: LASTFIGHT is a 1-4 player fighting game based on the French comic "Lastman".
results.name: LastFight

results.deck: Graceful Explosion Machine is a colorful, 2D shoot 'em up from Vertex Pop.
results.name: Graceful Explosion Machine
